data.message:
Put it
Out. Okay. This is a Call Out. 
Yep. That is Right.  
I am ready for a Bout. It’s
going to be Stout. 
At the end of it, I’ll probably plan a trip to go catch some Trout.
Marshall Mathers, Can YOU Hear me? Are you out there?
I’m going to chase you down and and hunt you with my Care Bear. Stare. 
You’re probably over there, hiding in your lair. Thinking, “ Go
Ahead. If you Dare.”
Pfffffftt. 
This is gonna be rare. 
Yep. As in, RAW. 
I beckon you with my finger, not even a claw. 
I have a bone to pick with you. 
First of all, props for killing off Slim. You needed to Trim. That fat. 
As for making amends with your mom, I was praying for that. It was pretty bomb. 
Listen, no doubt about it
Your music is…Fuck this Shit!
You suck and you need to get on
with it. 
As in, Stop being a Nit-Wit. 
As in, Ma Ake the world a better place. 
Otherwise, you are just a fucking Fa Ake. 
Yep. I’m on your case. 
I’m literally looking for a trace. 
I see it in your handsome face. (Don’t worry, I aint gonna go pick out
any lace. )
You have it in you. Until I hear it, I won’t know if you are true. Blue. 
I won’t even let you be in my crew. 
And on that, you can stew. 
That’s your Cue. 
Oh, that’s right. Now that you’ve
made the big League, 
All we get is a bunch of Intrigue. 
Let me be Strait. Here is my
Issue. Hold on a minute. Let me go get my Tissue. 
I’ve been blowing snot, Wishing I was on a cot.
Yep. As in. Jail. In Japan. Praying for a Ban.
I’ve been wiping my tears. This
hunting season, I’ve seen my share of fears. 
Yep. Taji. They kill dolphins and whales.
Some bought and sold into
captivity. All species and variety. 
Look it up and see the bloody coves. While we cooked at our Christmas Stoves. 
Whole pods killed or traumatized. It’s this kind of shit that makes me know I can’t be acclimatized. 
Come on, Man! Where are you?
Those sea creatures are dead and locked in suffering, while you eat and
complain about how you can’t dine at McDonalds for all the throngs that are
monitoring. 
What?
You sounded like a spoiled Brat, and that aint Phat.
You need to get a clue, dude. 
Don’t you care about your food?
Follow the chain, use your brain. Don’t be a stain. 
You need to be on the Conscious Resistance Train!!
